A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While the critics may find this to be a good movie\, the fans know that this is not a good Star Wars movie.  The plot lines from the last movie are simply dropped.  Characters that are supposed to play important roles are unceremoniously killed.  And\, now we know why Mark Hamill disagreed with Johnson's characterization of Luke.  What we learn of Luke in this movie is entirely inconsistent with everything in the original trilogy.  I'm not able to add anything that many other reviews already addressed\, but I'm making a point to post a review because Last Jedi hurts the franchise far more than the prequels did.
